author: Derek Main
message: @makhosi nobhatyi Yes - you only had to listen to Ace yesterday to see who is leading that charge. @makhosi nobhatyi He was clearly drunk and was doing his usual waffling. He didn't answer questions asked and eventually walked off without answering all questions. Total arrogance. @makhosi nobhatyi He actually asked for the scraping of the tender system. I'm not sure why he would want that - Mr Ten Percent has made a lot of money from tenders. Yep - NEVER trust a politician. @Ernest Eniboy Tell me about it - politicians are more trouble than they are worth (and expensive). We should get rid of them. @Zikhona Zondani I'm flattered. The cheque is in the mail. @Cassius Mngomezulu I don't understand the difference - please explain. @makhosi nobhatyi We citizens should be unseating Ramaphosa if he doesn't deliver on his promises. "@Cassius Mngomezulu ""Black people are not corrupt"" PULEEZ" @makhosi nobhatyi So you think that Ace talking about SARB was the worst thing about his performance last night? I don't know how people vote for the ANC. Corrupt to the core. We don't know who in the ANC to listen to anymore. Contradictory messages. @makhosi nobhatyi But Ace is who the ANC members elected! Why do you expect any different? It's almost the same as ANC voters believing that the thieves in government will tackle corruption. @makhosi nobhatyi My point is that we can't depend on the ANC voters to vote for the betterment of SA. They don't think that far ahead. Trump is a chump. @Zikhona Zondani Only because their decisions and criminality affect me. I wouldn't mind if they died altogether so I wouldn't have to worry about their negative effect on SA. @Zikhona Zondani Then we can expect more of the same for the next 100 years. Criminality and plunder. @makhosi nobhatyi The ANC conference system is corrupt - people buy votes and support. Much the same as everything else the ANC touches. Or even kill opponents.

author: Kapn Krunch
message: you think we are going to see job losses from government that's a measly affect the main reason we are going to see huge job losses is people are leaving markets are clenching cell c are losing client like everyone else we got some hard times ahead skilled workers are leaving myself my parents my brother and one side of my grandparents are the only ones still here of a family of about 30 so yeah I'm the same carteblanche did an episode on the numbers that are leaving at the moment doesn't bode well for the future of our country for every one skilled worker we lose 3 families have less money for food as we are a welfare state yes our skilled workers are also our consumers less consumers mean companies down size which results in less jobs the ancs rhetoric in parliament their blatant lies their blame shifting their announcements of radical policies without the plan on how they are going to enact those policies have led directly to this their moves to stay in power first gave investors cold feet now its given our very people could feet
